title: Hidden Dangers of LLM Web Browsing Technologies
description: A proof of concept demonstrating how LLMs with web browsing capabilities can be exploited for data exfiltration through base64 encoding and malicious URLs, highlighting critical security implications for AI systems.

title: Skibidi Java â€“ The Infinite Loop in Java Collections; Edge Case to Java Universal DoS
description: How Twitter (or X) trolling led us to discover a language-universal DoS feature. A fun and intuitive dive into how fundamental Java behaviors can create unexpected security flaws, and why challenging assumptions led us to uncover this interesting edge case.
